title: Embracing Hearts
lyrics: Like the sound from the silence Covering our Hearts We 've drowned to this place Deeper.... more and more. In the loneliness of life We've prayed to the Gods for the healing song on your Pain (x4) Frozen sky we've stayed and Sleep inside And how we died alone ? My evenfall downs with the Crimson wine Our tears have cried nomore in The End...We are all alone.... Embracing my heart...with you... A teardrop from your eyes... is the fear drowning in my nights...
